physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Elevated calcium and PTH levels indicating hypercalcemia; suspicion of parathyroid carcinoma.
Recurrent hypercalcemia with rising PTH levels.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Increased calcium and PTH levels compared to period before.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Postoperative hypocalcemia with a nadir calcium level of 6.9 mg/dL after surgery.
CT scan showed a 1.6-cm nodular soft tissue mass that increased in size.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Nodular soft tissue mass size increased compared to previous imaging.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Continued management with denosumab and cinacalcet; no hospitalizations for hypercalcemia in the last 3 months.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Stable calcium levels within reference range; elevated PTH levels.
